name: National Black Home Educators (NBHE)
description: Founded in 2000 by Eric and Joyce Burges, NBHE is a resource network dedicated to encouraging, supporting, and fostering fellowship among families who are exploring home education. They offer parent training sessions, homeschool consultations, and informational newsletters
services: Black-owned Homeschool networks in North-Dakota consultation

name: North Dakota Home School Association (NDHSA)
description: A Christian support group that provides information on homeschooling in North Dakota, including legal aspects and academic resources
services: Black-owned Homeschool networks in North-Dakota consultation

name: HEART
description: A homeschool support group serving families in the Fargo Baptist Church area, offering various activities and information
services: Black-owned Homeschool networks in North-Dakota consultation

name: FM Secular Homeschoolers
description: A secular homeschool support group for the Fargo/Moorhead areas, intended to offer a forum for sharing ideas and meeting new people
services: Black-owned Homeschool networks in North-Dakota consultation

name: Resources and Encouragement for Area Christian Homeschoolers (REACH)
description: A Christian homeschool support group serving families in the Fargo/Moorhead area (North Dakota and Minnesota)
services: Black-owned Homeschool networks in North-Dakota consultation

name: Greater Grand Forks Home School Association (GGFHSA)
description: A Christian support group for families in the Grand Forks/East Grand Forks area, offering growth opportunities and encouragement
services: Black-owned Homeschool networks in North-Dakota consultation
